participant_1.name: Jacob
participant_1.personality: nurturing and humorous, with a love for storytelling
participant_1.background: i'm a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i have a son who is in junior high school.

participant_2.name: Dr. Emily

participant_2.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.
